title: LibriVox Short Mystery Story Collection Vol. 001
description: Librivox recording of LibriVox Short Mystery Collection Vol. 001, by various authors. Librivox’s Short Mystery Story Collection 001: a collection of 10 short works of mysterious fiction in the public domain read by a group of LibriVox members. Read by Librivox volunteers. For more free audiobooks, or to become a volunteer reader, please visit librivox.org. M4B format available
subject: short story; mystery; short stories; stories; librivox
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
